Table 1: Row Properties (trHeight, tblHeader, cantSplit)

+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------+--------------------------------+
| Header 1                                                       | Header 2                        | Header 3                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------+--------------------------------+
| Top aligned (vAlign=top)                                       | Center aligned (vAlign=center)  | Bottom aligned (vAlign=bottom) |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------+--------------------------------+
| noWrap - this text will not wrap to multiple lines in the cell | tcFitText - text shrinks to fit | hideMark - cell marker hidden  |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------+--------------------------------+

Table 2: Cell Margins and Text Direction

+---------------------------------+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| Large margins (0.2in all sides) | textDirection btLr (bottom to top) | textDirection tbRl (top to bottom, right to left) |
+---------------------------------+------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+

Table 3: Nested Table

+-------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Outer table cell with nested table below: | Regular outer table cell |
+-------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
